content.raw:
Hi Carlos,

* Main launch file has had a namespace parameter added.  This has also been used to set the name of the gazebo model.
* Sensor namespaces have been altered as discussed.
* RViz configuration files have been updated with the new namespaces.
* Updated localisation example.  The tf names have also had the namespace prepended.
* Updated teleoperation examples.

Regards,

Jonathan.
content.html:
Hi Carlos,

  • Main launch file has had a namespace parameter added. This has also been used to set the name of the gazebo model.
  • Sensor namespaces have been altered as discussed.
  • RViz configuration files have been updated with the new namespaces.
  • Updated localisation example. The tf names have also had the namespace prepended.
  • Updated teleoperation examples.

Regards,

Jonathan.
